about_the_game:
“Legend of the Otherworld” is a 2D top-down shooter Roguelike game that transports players into a world of unknown and adventure. In this world, players are required to explore and battle, collecting various weapon components to create their own unique shooting effects and skills.

The core gameplay revolves around the combination of weapon components. Players can create a variety of unique shooting effects to deal with different combat environments and enemies by collecting and combining different weapon components. This design ensures that each game is filled with endless possibilities and challenges, requiring players to continuously experiment and optimize their weapon combinations to survive in this otherworld.

Additionally, the game boasts a rich skill system. Players can create a variety of powerful skills to enhance their combat effectiveness by combining weapon components. These skills not only help players gain an advantage in combat but also provide more strategic choices for players.

In summary, “Legend of the Otherworld” is a challenging and innovative game that offers players a new gaming experience. Whether you’re a seasoned shooter game player or a novice who enjoys exploration and adventure, “Legend of the Otherworld” is a game you can’t miss.
